title: Time-Resolved Operando Insights into the Tunable Selectivity of Cu-Zn Nanocubes during Pulsed CO2 Electroreduction
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Antonia Herzog, Martina Rüscher, Hyo Sang Jeon, Janis Timoshenko, Clara Rettenmaier, Uta Hejral, Earl Matthew Davis, Felix Thomas Haase, David Kordus, Stefanie Kühl, Wiebke Frandsen, Arno Bergmann, Beatriz Roldan Cuenya
Pulsed electrochemical CO2 reduction (CO2RR) has emerged as a facile way to alter the product selectivities toward desired multicarbon products, but so far, it has been mainly applied to monometallic...
